title: Teamwork

questions.text: When we have something to get done together (chores, errands, a project), I'd prefer to...
choices: Divide and conquer - we each tackle our own part
Work on it side by side, together
One of us takes the lead while the other supports
Figure it out as we go, no set plan

questions.text: When you're struggling with something, I'd want to...
choices: Jump in and help you handle it
Be there while you figure it out yourself
Ask how I can best support you
Give you space unless you ask for help

questions.text: When we're both busy with our own things (work, hobbies, tasks), I like...
choices: Being in the same room even if we're doing different things
Checking in with each other throughout the day
Fully focusing alone, then reconnecting later
Flexible - depends on the day and what we're doing

questions.text: For household stuff or shared responsibilities, I think we should...
choices: Play to our strengths - each do what we're good at
Share everything equally down the middle
Take turns so neither of us gets stuck with the boring stuff
Not overthink it - just do what needs doing

questions.text: What makes me feel like a great partner is...
choices: Supporting you when you need it
Building something together - a home, a life, memories
Celebrating each other's individual wins
Just being there, day in and day out

description: Explore how you'll tackle life as a team.
